entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 60 percent chance of rain showers or flurries changing to 60 percent chance of flurries late this evening. Wind northwest 50 km/h gusting to 70 except gusting to 90 over exposed coastal sections early this evening. Wind becoming north 30 gusting to 50 this evening. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 7:37 PM PST Tuesday 21 February 2023
